scripts.standalone: docker compose -f standalone.yml pull && node --experimental-specifier-resolution=node --loader ts-node/esm src/standalone.ts
scripts.test-api: docker compose -f standalone.yml pull && DEBUG='testcontainers' vitest run
scripts.start-testnet-remote: npm run build && npm run testnet-remote
scripts.start-testnet-remote-ps: npm run build && npm run testnet-remote-ps
scripts.start-testtoken: npm run build && npm run testnet-testtoken
scripts.start-standalone-testtoken: npm run build && npm run standalone-testtoken
scripts.start-simple-standalone: npm run build && npm run simple-standalone-testtoken
